title: taking screenshots
extract: Click on the window you would like to capture.Press Ctrl + Print Screen (Print Scrn) by holding down the Ctrl key and then pressing the Print Screen key. ... Click the Start button, located on the lower left-hand side of your desktop.Click on All Programs.Click on Accessories.Click on Paint.More items...•Nov 19, 2013
extract_html:
1. Click on the window you would like to capture.
  2. Press Ctrl + Print Screen (Print Scrn) by holding down the Ctrl key and then pressing the Print Screen key. ...
  3. Click the Start button, located on the lower left-hand side of your desktop.
  4. Click on All Programs.
  5. Click on Accessories.
  6. Click on Paint.
More items...
•
Nov 19, 2013
